rows.label: tev032401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev032401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Jajanni about Ma-non technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev032401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Jajanni about recent developments.

rows.label: tev032401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Jajanni about the device Lin is building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Jajanni about recent developments.

rows.label: tev032401_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Jajanni about Skell flight modules.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Jajanni about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0001
rows.name:
The Ma-non aren't exactly fans of creating things that
hurt people, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0002
rows.name:
So when discussions arose to work with you to create
weaponry...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, I suppose you'd say that not everyone was on
board? We actually argued about it for some time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0004
rows.name:
But in the end, we agreed that it would be unfair to
kick back and do do nothing while you put your lives
in danger, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0005
rows.name:
So we agreed to start Candid & Credible as a means
of providing you weapons, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Things that go boom may not be our specialty, but
Ma-non technology is the finest in the cosmos, right?
So please use our products to to save this city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Did you know that one of our finest technicians has
moved down to to the hangar under the administrative
district?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0012
rows.name: I think he decided to open a repair shop?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0013
rows.name:
You should be careful if you go speak to the old guy,
however. He can be kind of...touchy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0014
rows.name:
Frankly, I'm not even sure you and he will be able to
get along? But I hope you do, because he could be a
huge help to you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Lin asked us a whole barrage of questions about how
our ship's flight systems work, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0021
rows.name:
And now I finally know the reason, don't I?
She was working on a spectacular modification that
grants your Skells flight capabilities![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0022
rows.name:
I respect Lin's ingenuity, even if she has a host of
technical problems she must still overcome...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0023
rows.name:
I hope her big dream becomes a big reality,
don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0028
rows.name:
The other day I decided to do a little research into
what the other arms manufacturers are making, right?
So I went out and bought a Sakuraba weapon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0029
rows.name:
It's actually quite impressive. You can tell they take
pride in their quality, can't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0030
rows.name:
I did a little poking around to find out who their
lead engineer is, you know? Turns out it's an older
fellow by by the name of Isobe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0031
rows.name:
I observed him from a distance, and all he did was yell
at his workers. So I didn't dare approach him to ask
more specific questions, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG0032
rows.name: Still, I hope that one day we can talk shop?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1001
rows.name:
The Skell flight modules should allow you to reach
previously inaccessible areas and further your research,
correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1002
rows.name:
They also let you attack enemies on the ground with
impunity, right? I imagine that must be be fun...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1003
rows.name:
But all that flying around expends a great deal of fuel,
doesn't it? It's probably something you want to keep in
mind at all times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1004
rows.name:
You don't want to be a mile off the ground when you
run out of fuel, no? That would be so so bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1005
rows.name:
So enjoy flying Mira's skies, but don't forget to keep
one eye on your fuel at all times, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1010
rows.name:
After burning the midnight oil with Isobe to get the
project done, he actually opened up a little...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1011
rows.name:
Now C&C and Sakuraba are periodically sharing tech
and improving our services. Which is great, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1012
rows.name:
The thing is, Isobe let me have an up-close-and-
personal look at your Skell tech, and I have to say...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1013
rows.name:
Well, honestly, it's way beyond anything else you you
humans have cooked up. Huge parts of it are just
completely out of your league. Er, no offense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032401_MSG1014
rows.name:
I wonder who the original architect was?
Isobe didn't know, which just adds to to the mystery.[ST:wait ]
